NK010(tha)022:0: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phur pa rgyud lugs kyi
NK010(tha)022:1: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bdud rtsi'i thigs pa zhes bya
NK010(tha)022:2: ba bzhugs / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra ku m+aa ra
NK010(tha)022:3: la na mah 'dir zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg gi rim
NK010(tha)022:4: ba bzhugs / pa ni / rgyud las /
NK010(tha)022:5: las kyi rim pa bya ba yang //
NK010(tha)022:6: sbyin bsreg dag ni rab tu bya //
NK010(tha)022:7: thams cad ma lus zhi ba'i phyir //
NK010(tha)022:8: shin tu kha dog dkar la 'tsher //
NK010(tha)022:9: zhi ba'i thab khung de byas te //
NK010(tha)022:10: khru gang khru do'i tshad du bya //
NK010(tha)022:12: mngar gsum dang ni rab ldan te //
NK010(tha)022:13: zhi ba'i rdzas ni ma lus bsag /
NK010(tha)022:14: me tog dkar po til dkar dang //
NK010(tha)022:15: 'bras chen til sogs dngul phye bsag /
NK010(tha)022:16: bsreg shing khru gang tshad byas te //
NK010(tha)022:17: yam shing mtho gang sor bzhi bya //
NK010(tha)022:18: shin du dri zhim dri yis byug /
NK010(tha)022:19: ces pas gza' skar bzang po la dul ba ma
NK010(tha)022:20: yin pa'i gnas su ni sa'i cho ga nges par
NK010(tha)022:21: bya la / sa stegs thab rgya dang 'tshams pa
NK010(tha)022:22: 'thas par bcags la thig chen brgyad btab pa'i dbus
NK010(tha)022:23: sor mo nyi shu rtsa gcig gis zlum skor gyi
NK010(tha)022:24: nang du rtsibs brgyad kyi lte bar chos 'byung mthing
NK010(tha)022:26: de'i phyir sor bzhi re yod pa'i mchu dang kha khyer gsum gyi bar mar me ri /
NK010(tha)022:27: phyi mar rdo rje'i phreng ba /
NK010(tha)022:28: zur bzhir zla rdor bris pa'i steng bud shing bzang
NK010(tha)022:29: po rtse khru gang bas zlum skor du rgya las
NK010(tha)022:30: phyed chas dman pa'i dpangs su brtsig /
NK010(tha)022:31: slob dpon gyi g.yon logs su 'o ma 'bras chen
NK010(tha)022:32: dngul phye me tog dkar po rnams kyi rgyu las
NK010(tha)022:33: / mchod gtor gtsang ma 'jig 'das kyi rim pa gnyis su bsham /
NK010(tha)022:34: g.yas ngos su bsreg rdzas ni /
NK010(tha)022:38: dkar gsum mngar gsum dang 'o thug bsres pa'i zas mchog /
NK010(tha)022:47: khyad par gyi rdzas me tog dkar po dang /
NK010(tha)022:52: si h+la sogs kyang 'jig 'das so sor bsham mo //
NK010(tha)022:53: gnyis pa dngos gzhi la drug las /
NK010(tha)022:54: dang po bdag bskyed ni gzhung bzhin dang /
NK010(tha)022:55: zhar la las bum kyang bsgrub bo //
NK010(tha)022:56: gnyis pa rdor dril byin brlab ni /
NK010(tha)022:57: thabs shes kyi de kho na nyid dran pas /
NK010(tha)022:59: zhes rdo rje lan gsum gsor /
NK010(tha)022:61: zhes pas dril bu 'khrol zhing dkur brten /
NK010(tha)022:62: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu r+aa ga na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa at+ma ko&a ham /
NK010(tha)022:63: zhes 'khyud rgya byas te dam tshig gsum dang du blang ngo //
NK010(tha)022:64: gsum pa mchod rdzas brlab pa ni /
NK010(tha)022:66: rnam dag chos dbyings ngang nyid las //
NK010(tha)022:67: rang byung mchod pa'i phung po ni //
NK010(tha)022:68: kun bzang mchod pa'i sprin lta bur //
NK010(tha)022:69: dpag yas nam mkha' gang bar gyur //
NK010(tha)022:71: sman raka gtor ma'i sngags lan gsum brjod /
NK010(tha)022:72: bzhi pa bsreg rdzas brlab pa ni /
NK010(tha)022:73: las bum gyi chus gtor zhing /
NK010(tha)022:74: h+aum big nam ta krita kyis bgegs bsang /
NK010(tha)022:76: stong pa'i ngang las ma dang a las byung ba'i
NK010(tha)022:77: nyi zla'i ga'u'i snod du bsreg rdzas rnams so so'i
NK010(tha)022:78: ming yig dang po thig les brgyan pa 'od du
NK010(tha)022:79: zhu ba las byung ba'i bdud rtsi'i dngos po so
NK010(tha)022:80: so'i byed las 'grub pa'i nus pa can du gyur
NK010(tha)022:84: lnga pa thab bskyed nas me lha lhar shes pa la mchod pa ni /
NK010(tha)022:86: stong pa'i ngang las rang mdun du //
NK010(tha)022:87: b+h+r+aum yig yongs su gyur pa las //
NK010(tha)022:88: zhi ba'i thab khung dkar la zlum //
NK010(tha)022:89: mu ran kha khyer zla tshes can //
NK010(tha)022:90: sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba ru //
NK010(tha)022:91: ram las zhi ba'i me lha ni //
NK010(tha)022:92: spun la kha dog dkar po ste //
NK010(tha)022:94: ra skyes dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs //
NK010(tha)022:95: bgrang phreng ril ba phyag na bsnams //
NK010(tha)022:96: nyon mongs thams cad zhi mdzad pas //
NK010(tha)022:97: drang srong tshogs kyis bskor bar gyur //
NK010(tha)022:98: de ltar du gsal ba'i spyi bor /
NK010(tha)022:99: mgrin par +aah thugs kar h+aum gis mtshan pa las 'od zer 'phros /
NK010(tha)022:100: shar lho nas me lha 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs par gyur /
NK010(tha)022:103: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
NK010(tha)022:104: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che //
NK010(tha)022:105: me lha'i drang srong bram ze'i mchog /
NK010(tha)022:106: sum cu rtsa lnga'i lnga tshigs ni //
NK010(tha)022:107: lnga pa me lha zhes kyang bya //
NK010(tha)022:108: rab tu spun la sku mdog dkar //
NK010(tha)022:109: mgrin pa ring la gsung yang snyan //
NK010(tha)022:110: thugs rje'i dbang gis spyan 'dren na //
NK010(tha)022:111: 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs nas ni //
NK010(tha)022:112: sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes su gsol //
NK010(tha)022:113: khyod la phrin las bcol ba ni //
NK010(tha)022:114: thabs khung ma nyams dam pa 'dir //
NK010(tha)022:115: drongs shig drongs shig me drongs shig /
NK010(tha)022:116: spor cig spor cig me spor cig /
NK010(tha)022:117: zur phud can gyi me gsos la //
NK010(tha)022:118: kha 'bar ma yi me bus cig /
NK010(tha)022:119: bram ze'i bu mo lnga brgya yang //
NK010(tha)022:120: khyod kyis g.yog dang bran du khol //
NK010(tha)022:121: thugs dam rgyud bskul bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod //
NK010(tha)022:124: las sngags kyis phyir 'brangs bgegs rnams bskrad /
NK010(tha)022:126: badz+ra ag+ne ram tsi ti shag ram /
NK010(tha)022:129: zhes rje'u rigs kyi khyim las byung ba'i me sbar /
NK010(tha)022:132: me lha drang srong nyon mongs bsreg /
NK010(tha)022:134: 'bar ba'i me yi dbyings na bzhugs //
NK010(tha)022:135: drang srong chen po me yi lha //
NK010(tha)022:138: +amo badz+ra any+dza ma nam +aa h+aum gis zhal bsil dang /
NK010(tha)022:139: byon skyems dgang blugs phul la /
NK010(tha)022:140: ag na ye ha bya ka bya ham ha na ye ti bya ti pa yi s+w+aa h+aa /
NK010(tha)022:145: badz+ra nee wi d+ya +aahh+aum s+w+aa h+aa /
NK010(tha)022:147: de nas bsreg rdzas rnams yam shing nas rim par /
NK010(tha)022:148: ag na ye ha bya ka bya /
NK010(tha)022:150: ti bya ti pa ye sh+aan+tim ku ru s+w+aa h+aa /
NK010(tha)022:151: zhes pa kho nas phul zhing 'dod gsol ni /
NK010(tha)022:152: dus min 'chi dang nad rnams dang //
NK010(tha)022:153: gdon dang bgegs rnams med par mdzod //
NK010(tha)022:154: rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan //
NK010(tha)022:155: byad stems thams cad med par mdzod //
NK010(tha)022:156: ces rkang pa bzhi po brjod /
NK010(tha)022:157: rdzas rdzogs pa dang dgang blugs gsum phul la gzi byin bskyed /
NK010(tha)022:160: dri za'i dbang phyug me yi lha //
NK010(tha)022:162: bsreg rdzas phul na don bsgrub pa //
NK010(tha)022:163: drang srong chen po khyod la bstod //
NK010(tha)022:164: drug pa me lha gzhal yas khang du shes nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mchod pa ni /
NK010(tha)022:166: rtsa ba gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor dang //
NK010(tha)022:167: phur pa lha yi dkyil 'khor dang //
NK010(tha)022:168: phyogs bcu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rnams //
NK010(tha)022:169: me lha'i snying gar rdzogs par bskyed //
NK010(tha)022:173: me lha'i lto ba yangs shing rgya che'i dbus //
NK010(tha)022:174: rak+ta'i rgya mtsho chen po 'khyil ba'i klong //
NK010(tha)022:175: keng rus chen po'i ri rab brtsegs pa'i steng //
NK010(tha)022:176: rdo rje'i brag chen gtams pa'i sa gzhi la //
NK010(tha)022:177: dur khrod chen po 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang //
NK010(tha)022:178: sus kyang ma bskyed ye nas tshad las 'das //
NK010(tha)022:179: bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nang //
NK010(tha)022:180: dregs pa lha chen bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su //
NK010(tha)022:181: nyi zla'i gdan bshams pad+ma'i ge sar bcas //
NK010(tha)022:182: tshad dang mtshan nyid ma lus yongs su rdzogs //
NK010(tha)022:183: zhes pas me lha'i skye mched rten gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin du bskyed nas /
NK010(tha)022:184: brten pa'i lha gsal gdab pa ni /
NK010(tha)022:185: gtso bo'i gnas su h+aum mthing nag yongs su gyur
NK010(tha)022:186: pa las 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje
NK010(tha)022:187: gzhon nu dbu gsum phyag drug pa /
NK010(tha)022:188: zhabs rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa /
NK010(tha)022:191: dbus mthing nag tu bzhugs pa /
NK010(tha)022:192: g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje rtse dgu pa dang /
NK010(tha)022:193: g.yon dang po na me dpung 'bar ba bsnams pa /
NK010(tha)022:194: g.yas bar pa na rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
NK010(tha)022:197: g.yon bar pa na kha t+w+aam dang /
NK010(tha)022:200: g.yas tha ma na phur pa dang /
NK010(tha)022:201: g.yon tha ma na rbod gtong phra men gyi tshogs bsnams te /
NK010(tha)022:208: gnyis bskums te dor stabs su bzhugs pa'o //
NK010(tha)022:209: sku la bskal pa'i me ri dang /
NK010(tha)022:210: glang po che'i ko rlon dang /
NK010(tha)022:212: zhing chen gyi pags pa dang /
NK010(tha)022:222: thugs rjes chags pa khrag gi rgya mtsho la gsol ba'o //
NK010(tha)022:223: yum 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
NK010(tha)022:224: g.yas yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud pa /
NK010(tha)022:225: g.yon b+han+d+ha rak+tasa bkang nas yab kyi zhal du stob pa /
NK010(tha)022:226: sku la dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
NK010(tha)022:232: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par bzhugs pa'o //
NK010(tha)022:233: de'i ngang las rdo rje chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NK010(tha)022:234: rdo rje chags pa'i don la bskul bar mdzad /
NK010(tha)022:235: yab kyis sa ma ya hoh yum gyis sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK010(tha)022:238: yab yum gnyis su med par gyur /
NK010(tha)022:239: pad+ma yo gi ni sa ma ya pra be sha ya phata /
NK010(tha)022:240: yab kyi byang chub sems yum mkhar babs pas yum yang byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du gyur /
NK010(tha)022:242: bi shwa badz+ra kro ta dz+wa la man+da la ha la ha la h+aum phata /
NK010(tha)022:243: ces brjod pas byang chub kyi sems lan gcig 'phros pas khro bo 'chol ba'i rang bzhin du gyur /
NK010(tha)022:244: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lhag gis khengs /
NK010(tha)022:245: nyon mongs pa dang log par lta ba'i sems can thams cad bsgral /
NK010(tha)022:246: slar de dag thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga la bsdus te 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas /
NK010(tha)022:247: phyogs skyong dregs pa can thams cad kyang bsgral te
NK010(tha)022:248: rtsibs bcur gdan du byas pa'i steng khro bo'i dkyil
NK010(tha)022:250: h+aum h+aum dzahdzah shar phyogs su khro bo rnam par
NK010(tha)022:251: rgyal ba dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs rnam pa bzhi
NK010(tha)022:252: dang ldan zhing dur khrod kyi chas brgyad kyis brgyan
NK010(tha)022:253: pa / yum rdo rje snyems ma dang 'khril nas
NK010(tha)022:254: brgya byin gyi gdan la brkyangs bskums su bzhugs pa'i
NK010(tha)022:255: g.yas su yab kyi sprul pa stag gi mgo can
NK010(tha)022:256: pa / dang / g.yon du yum gyi sprul pa bya rgod kyi mgo can no //
NK010(tha)022:257: de bzhin du h+aum h+aum dzahdzah lhor khro bo gshin rje'i gshed dang yum dur khrod bdag mo /
NK010(tha)022:258: sprul pa sha ba dang 'ug pa'i mgo can no /
NK010(tha)022:259: h+aum h+aum dzahdzah nub tu khro bo rta mchog dpal dang yum rdo rje gtum mo /
NK010(tha)022:260: sprul pa byi la dang pu shud mgo can /
NK010(tha)022:261: h+aum h+aum dzahdzah byang du khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang /
NK010(tha)022:263: sprul pa seng ge dang pha wang mgo can /
NK010(tha)022:264: h+aum h+aum dzahdzah shar lhor khro bo dbyug pa sngon po dang yum rdo rje sder mo /
NK010(tha)022:265: sprul pa g.yag dang bya rog mgo can /
NK010(tha)022:266: h+aum h+aum dzahdzah lho nub tu khro bo mi g.yo mgon po dang yum rdo rje gtun khung ma /
NK010(tha)022:267: sprul pa gzig dang khwa ta'i mgo can /
NK010(tha)022:268: h+aum h+aum dzahdzah nub byang du khro bo gzhan gyis
NK010(tha)022:269: mi thub pa dang yum rdo rje mda' snyems ma
NK010(tha)022:270: / sprul pa spyang ki dang khra'o mgo can /
NK010(tha)022:271: h+aum h+aum dzahdzah byang shar du khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal dang yum rdo rje gsod byed ma /
NK010(tha)022:272: sprul pa dom dang sre mo'i mgo can /
NK010(tha)022:273: h+aum h+aum dzahdzah steng phyogs su khro bo h+aum k+aa ra dang yum rdo rje sgra 'byin ma /
NK010(tha)022:274: sprul pa phag dang smig bu'i mgo can /
NK010(tha)022:275: h+aum h+aum dzahdzah 'og phyogs su khro bo stobs po che dang yum rdo rje skyod byed ma /
NK010(tha)022:276: sprul pa dred dang byi ba'i mgo can rnams bzhugs pa'o //
NK010(tha)022:277: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya sarba big na bam h+aum phata /
NK010(tha)022:278: ces brjod pas sras mchog rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor dbu gsum phyag drug pa /
NK010(tha)022:279: sku smad phur bu'i dbal dang ldan pa zla gam gsum la bka' nod pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
NK010(tha)022:280: dzahh+aum bam hohls sgo bzhir sgo ma bzhi dang /
NK010(tha)022:281: mu ran la phur srung dam can gyi tshogs rnams mngon sum lta bur bzhugs pa'o //
NK010(tha)022:282: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnas gsum du gtugs la /
NK010(tha)022:283: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa k+aa ya badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK010(tha)022:284: de bzhin du w+aa k+ka dang /
NK010(tha)022:285: tsit+ta sbyar bas byin gyis rlob /
NK010(tha)022:287: srid pa phur bur bsgrub pa dang //
NK010(tha)022:288: dbang dang dngos grub stsol ba'i phyir //
NK010(tha)022:289: ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol //
NK010(tha)022:290: khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang //
NK010(tha)022:291: rtags dang mtshan ma ston pa dang //
NK010(tha)022:292: rdo rje phur pa'i dngos grub stsol //
NK010(tha)022:298: gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas //
NK010(tha)022:299: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
NK010(tha)022:300: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs he ru ka /
NK010(tha)022:301: bsreg khang me yi dkyil 'khor du //
NK010(tha)022:303: byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol //
NK010(tha)022:304: dzahh+aum bam hoh badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya sarba big nan bam h+aum phata /
NK010(tha)022:305: a gats+tsha ya a gats+tsha ya /
NK010(tha)022:306: pra be sha ya pra be sha ya /
NK010(tha)022:307: sho ta ya sho ta ya /
NK010(tha)022:308: badz+ra ta ki ni h+aum phata /
NK010(tha)022:309: de nas dam ye gnyis med du bya ba'i phyir /
NK010(tha)022:311: +aahbadz+ra sa ma ya +aah h+aum badz+ra sa ma ya h+aum /
NK010(tha)022:312: s+w+aa badz+ra sa ma ya s+w+aa /
NK010(tha)022:313: h+aa badz+ra sa ma ya h+aa /
NK010(tha)022:315: ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs //
NK010(tha)022:316: yon tan phrin las rmad po che //
NK010(tha)022:317: de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i //
NK010(tha)022:318: phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /
NK010(tha)022:322: bla med mchog gi mchod pa dam pa ni //
NK010(tha)022:324: sh+r+ai badz+ra ku m+aa ra sa pa ri w+aa ra ar+g+ham sogs kyis dbul /
NK010(tha)022:325: de nas bsreg rdzas dbul ba ni /
NK010(tha)022:326: dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rnams kyi ljags rdo rje'i
NK010(tha)022:327: sbu gu can gyis sreg blugs kyi rgyun drangs te
NK010(tha)022:328: gsol bas zhi ba'i phrin las mdzad par gyur /
NK010(tha)022:330: rtsa sngags lan bdun gyis dgang blugs bkang la /
NK010(tha)022:332: badz+ra ag+ne dz+wa la s+pha ra na ma h+aa p+au dza kh+aa hi h+aum phata /
NK010(tha)022:336: gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas //
NK010(tha)022:338: yud tsam gyis ni zhi mdzad pas //
NK010(tha)022:339: zhi mdzad mchod pa bzhes su gsol //
NK010(tha)022:341: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya /
NK010(tha)022:342: dzahh+aum bam hoh sarba big nan bam h+aum h+aum phata /
NK010(tha)022:344: zhes pa kho nas dbul ba ni rdo rje khros pa'i bshad rgyud kyi dgongs pa yin la /
NK010(tha)022:345: rnam pa gcig tu so so'i sngags kyis dbul na phrin las kyi rgyud las /
NK010(tha)022:346: de nas gtso bo yab yum dang //
NK010(tha)022:347: phyogs kyi khro bo lnga rnams la //
NK010(tha)022:348: brgya rtsa brgyad kyi sreg blugs dbul //
NK010(tha)022:349: khro bo yab yum nyi shu gcig /
NK010(tha)022:350: phra men sgo ma la ni bdun //
NK010(tha)022:351: so so'i sngags kyi sham dag la //
NK010(tha)022:352: 'di zhes bya ba zhi gyur cig /
NK010(tha)022:354: de byas gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ni //
NK010(tha)022:355: thams cad ma lus zhi bar 'gyur //
NK010(tha)022:358: bzlas brjod me dang 'dra ba yi //
NK010(tha)022:359: nyon mongs r+ts+wa mchog 'dra ba bsreg /
NK010(tha)022:360: ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par las //
NK010(tha)022:361: drod rnams 'byung bar gdon mi za //
NK010(tha)022:362: zhes pas bzlas brjod dang ting nge 'dzin ni las
NK010(tha)022:363: 'grub pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo yin pas rdzas mang la
NK010(tha)022:364: sngags nyung ba yang mi legs so //
NK010(tha)022:365: de yang brgya rtsa re'i mtshams su thugs dam bskul ba'i phyir /
NK010(tha)022:367: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon bdag rnams //
NK010(tha)022:368: sgrib gnyis byang zhing tshogs gnyis rdzogs //
NK010(tha)022:369: byad phur gdon bgegs rims nad dang //
NK010(tha)022:370: rmi ltas mtshan ngan dus min 'chi //
NK010(tha)022:371: 'jigs pa brgyad dang bcu drug sogs //
NK010(tha)022:372: myur du zhi zhing med par mdzod //
NK010(tha)022:373: ces 'dod don gsol bas lha tshogs rnams kyi sku
NK010(tha)022:374: las zla ba chu shel lta bu'i 'od zer 'phros
NK010(tha)022:375: rang dang bsgrub bya la reg pas nad gdon sdig
NK010(tha)022:376: sgrib la sogs zhi bar bsam mo //
NK010(tha)022:377: rdzas rdzogs pa dang dgang blug 'bul ba ni /
NK010(tha)022:378: rtsa sngags sham badz+ra ag+ne dz+wa la s+pha ra na ma h+aa p+au dza kh+aa hi h+aum phata /
NK010(tha)022:380: de nas de la sogs dang /
NK010(tha)022:381: badz+ra wa stra ye s+w+aa h+aas gos zung dang /
NK010(tha)022:382: badz+ra tam+bu la ye s+w+aa h+aas so rtsi dbul /
NK010(tha)022:383: de nas sman gtor rak+ta 'bul ba ni /
NK010(tha)022:385: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing //
NK010(tha)022:386: rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag /
NK010(tha)022:387: rtsa brgyad yan lag stong sbyar sman //
NK010(tha)022:388: rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos //
NK010(tha)022:389: sgron ma lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga //
NK010(tha)022:390: rgyud lnga dug lnga 'joms pa'i bdud //
NK010(tha)022:391: ye shes lnga po grub pa'i rtsi //
NK010(tha)022:392: 'chi ba med pa'i dam rdzas che //
NK010(tha)022:394: sarba pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK010(tha)022:397: mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la bab //
NK010(tha)022:398: dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab //
NK010(tha)022:399: phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la bab //
NK010(tha)022:400: dug gsum mchod par rab phul bas //
NK010(tha)022:401: sangs rgyas sku gsum thob par 'gyur //
NK010(tha)022:402: ma h+aa ba ling+ta kh+aa hi /
NK010(tha)022:404: de nas rak+ta tshar gsum ni /
NK010(tha)022:406: dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i gegs //
NK010(tha)022:407: gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams //
NK010(tha)022:408: zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings //
NK010(tha)022:409: gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis //
NK010(tha)022:410: rengs par khug la smrar chug cig /
NK010(tha)022:411: phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis //
NK010(tha)022:412: nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang //
NK010(tha)022:413: bsgo ba'i bka' la nyan par gyis //
NK010(tha)022:416: bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs //
NK010(tha)022:417: khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab //
NK010(tha)022:418: sngon chad ji bzhin bcas pa yi //
NK010(tha)022:419: mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod //
NK010(tha)022:422: dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs //
NK010(tha)022:423: gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams //
NK010(tha)022:425: nga la bar chad byed pa rnams //
NK010(tha)022:426: mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par mdzod //
NK010(tha)022:428: de nas sbyor sgrol gyi mchod pa ni /
NK010(tha)022:430: rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun //
NK010(tha)022:431: bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams //
NK010(tha)022:432: rdo rje me dbal snying bsreg nas //
NK010(tha)022:433: lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlogs //
NK010(tha)022:434: khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du //
NK010(tha)022:435: rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas //
NK010(tha)022:436: lha yang rung ste bsgral bar gyis //
NK010(tha)022:437: kha tham kha tham kha tham /
NK010(tha)022:438: kh+aa hi kh+aa hi kh+aa hi /
NK010(tha)022:444: snang srid thams cad phur pa'i rang bzhin las //
NK010(tha)022:445: khams gsum 'khor ba ming yang mi grags kyang //
NK010(tha)022:446: rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i phyir //
NK010(tha)022:447: rdo rje mngon spyod phrin las mdzad la bstod //
NK010(tha)022:450: mthar yi ge brgya pas bshags //
NK010(tha)022:451: khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
NK010(tha)022:453: gsum pa rjes kyi rim pa la /
NK010(tha)022:455: ces blugs gzar gyis me gsos pas me lha sngar bzhin bsam /
NK010(tha)022:456: ag+na ye ha bya ka bya ham ha na ye
NK010(tha)022:457: ti bya ti ba ye sh+aan+tim ku ru s+w+aa h+aa
NK010(tha)022:458: / zhes pas rdzas lhag rnams dang /
NK010(tha)022:461: ag+ne de wa ri shi ar+g+ham sogs kyis nyer sbyod dbul /
NK010(tha)022:463: a k+aa ros gtor ma bsngosa la /
NK010(tha)022:464: mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK010(tha)022:466: ma rnyed yongs su ma tshang dang //
NK010(tha)022:467: gtso bo nus pa ma mchis pas //
NK010(tha)022:468: 'dir ni bya ba gang bgyis pa //
NK010(tha)022:469: de kun khyod kyi bzod mdzad rigs //
NK010(tha)022:471: bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don //
NK010(tha)022:472: sgrub byed bsreg bya za ba gshegs //
NK010(tha)022:473: ji lta'i dus su tshur byon la //
NK010(tha)022:474: bdag gi dngos grub thams cad bsgrub //
NK010(tha)022:475: badz+ra muhs ye shes pa gshegs /
NK010(tha)022:476: dam tshig pa 'bar ba'i rnam par gyur /
NK010(tha)022:477: zhes brjod la dge ba bsngo ba dang /
NK010(tha)022:478: shis pa brjod pas mtha' rgyas su bya /
NK010(tha)022:479: me rang zhir btang ba sogs rjes kyi bya ba spyi dang 'dra'o //
NK010(tha)022:482: sbyin bsreg gis ni thams cad 'grub //
NK010(tha)022:483: dam tshig nyams pa skong 'gyur zhing //
NK010(tha)022:484: mtshams med lnga yi sdig byas pa //
NK010(tha)022:487: zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg gi rim pa rdo rje phur
NK010(tha)022:488: pa'i rgyud sde rgya mtsho'i rang lugs sor bzhag cing
NK010(tha)022:489: / mngon rtogs rgyud tshig ltar bkod pa 'di yang rig 'dzin 'jigs med gling bas so //
NK010(tha)022:491: rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal sngon du btang nas /
NK010(tha)022:492: rak+ta'i rgya mtsho chen po 'khyil ba'i klong //
NK010(tha)022:494: srid pa phur bur bsgrub pa dang //
NK010(tha)022:497: zhes dbang bskur ba yan brjod nas /
NK010(tha)022:498: k+ai la ya brgya rtsa bzlas rjes /
NK010(tha)022:499: las bum a mri tas bsgrub bo //
